mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into sys_doctor_complaint ( id, userid, doctorid, content, pic, create_date, del_flag ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
